title: Correctional Officers as School Resource Officers

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Massachusetts Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Records that detail the extent to which correctional officers and other Department of Corrections (DOC) employees act as school resource officers (SROs) from January 1, 2023 to the time this request is filled. Specifically, I request records that show the name and title of DOC department employees who act as SROs, the school districts where they have worked, and any training or certification that the employee has received related to work as an SRO.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as we believe this request is in the public interest, as suggested but not stipulated by the recommendations of the Massachusetts Supervisor of Public Records. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge as part of the public information service at MuckRock.com, and is not made for commercial usage.

I expect the request to be filled in an accessible format, including for screen readers, which provide text-to-speech for persons unable to read print. Files that are not accessible to screen readers include, for example, .pdf image files as well as physical documents.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joshua Dankoff

title: Kyle McMahan Arrest – December 5, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all records related to the arrest of Kyle Stephen McMahan on December 5, 2024, at approximately 12:00 AM, by the Sarasota County Sheriff’s Office, in or near Sarasota, Florida.

According to public records, McMahan was arrested and charged with multiple serious felony offenses, including:

Sexual Battery by Person 18 or Older on Victim Under 12 Years Old (3 counts)

Lewd or Lascivious Molestation on Victim Under 12 by Offender 18 or Older

Lewd or Lascivious Conduct by Person 18 or Older

Lewd or Lascivious Exhibition to a Victim Under 16 Years Old by Person 18 or Older

Distribution or Transmission of Obscene Material to a Minor

I am specifically requesting:

The full incident and arrest reports, including probable cause affidavits, investigative summaries, and any related documentation

Any body-worn camera (BWC) footage, if applicable, from the arrest or initial contact

Any digital forensic reports, evidence logs, and descriptions of materials collected or analyzed

911 call audio and transcripts, dispatch (CAD) logs, or officer communications

Any forensic interview reports involving the victim(s) and any documentation shared with the State Attorney’s Office

Any relevant search warrant returns and associated filings

Given the extremely serious and sensitive nature of the charges, this request is made in the public interest to support transparency in criminal investigations involving child exploitation and abuse.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Thomas Jackson

title: Leah Jenness Arrest – June 15, 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all records related to the arrest of Leah Kirsten Jenness on June 15, 2023, at approximately 12:00 AM, by the Charlotte County Sheriff’s Office (CCSO-FL0080000), at or near 5521 Gillott Blvd., Port Charlotte, FL 33981.

According to public records, Jenness was charged with 19 serious felony counts, including:

Multiple counts of Aggravated Assault with a Deadly Weapon without Intent to Kill

Multiple counts of Robbery with a Firearm

Murder Not Premeditated During Specific Felony

Torture Inflicting Serious Injury or Death

Burglary While Armed

Bond violation/revocation

The total bond amount was listed as $6,925,000.

I am specifically requesting:

The complete arrest and incident reports, including all officer narratives, probable cause affidavits, and charge documentation

Any body-worn camera (BWC) footage, in-car camera footage, or surveillance footage obtained or recorded during the investigation or arrest

Any 911 call recordings, CAD/dispatch logs, or radio traffic from law enforcement responding to this event

Crime scene photographs, forensic reports, and collected evidence logs

Statements from witnesses, co-defendants, or victims

Any documents forwarded to the State Attorney’s Office related to charges of homicide, robbery, or aggravated assault

Given the extreme seriousness of the charges—including murder, armed robbery, and aggravated assault—this request is submitted in the public interest for transparency and accountability in the handling of high-profile violent felony cases involving young defendants.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Thomas Jackson

title: Kelly Cavanah Arrest – November 28, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all records related to the arrest of Kelly Dan Cavanah on November 28, 2024, at approximately 1:41 PM, by the Florida Highway Patrol (FHP). According to the arrest information, Cavanah was taken into custody in or near Ocala, Florida 34470, and is currently facing 21 separate charges, with a combined bond amount of $1,375,000.

The charges include, but are not limited to:

Trafficking in Methamphetamine (14 grams or more)

Possession with Intent to Sell Controlled Substances

Fleeing/Eluding Law Enforcement with Lights & Siren Active

Resisting Arrest with Violence

Multiple counts of Possession of Firearm/Ammo by a Convicted Felon

Weapon Offenses during Commission of a Felony

Grand Theft of a Motor Vehicle

Tampering with Physical Evidence

Traffic Violations (Driving as Habitual Offender, Unregistered Vehicle)

I am specifically requesting:

The complete arrest and incident reports, including probable cause affidavits, officer narratives, and supplemental documents

Any dash cam or body-worn camera (BWC) footage, particularly during any pursuit, arrest, or search

Photographs, evidence logs, and search/seizure documentation

Any 911 call recordings, CAD logs, and dispatch communications

Any reports submitted to or received from the State Attorney’s Office

Given the breadth and severity of the charges, which involve narcotics trafficking, firearms violations, vehicle theft, and evasion of law enforcement, this request is made in the public interest to better understand how such a multi-felony case was investigated and handled.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Thomas Jackson

title: Anthony Bisio Arrest – February 5, 2025

communications.communication:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all records related to the arrest of Anthony Bisio on February 5, 2025, at approximately 8:40 PM, by the Pinellas County Sheriff’s Office. According to the arrest record, the incident occurred at or near the 2900 block of Somersworth Dr, Clearwater, FL 33761.

Bisio was charged with a total of 15 offenses, including:

12 counts of Sexual Activity Involving Animals

3 counts of Possession of Child Pornography

These charges involve multiple felony-level offenses under Florida law.

I am specifically requesting:

The complete arrest and incident reports, including probable cause affidavits, officer/investigator narratives, and charge summaries

Any witness or suspect interviews, written or recorded

Any available body-worn camera (BWC) footage or forensic documentation

911 call recordings and dispatch (CAD) logs related to the arrest or initial reporting

This request is submitted in the public interest due to the serious and disturbing nature of the charges, and to better understand the law enforcement response and case development in incidents involving crimes of this magnitude.

Sincerely,

Thomas Jackson

title: Steven Gettis Arrest – March 27, 2025

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting all records related to the arrest of Steven Gettis on March 27, 2025, at approximately 11:56 PM, in Aventura, Florida, with a listed residence in the 20000 block of E Country Club Dr. The total bond amount was set at $51,000.

According to public records, Gettis was arrested on the following charges:

Lewd and Lascivious Exhibition on a Child Under 16 (Defendant Over 18)

Lewd and Lascivious Conduct on a Child Under 16

Luring or Enticing a Child
